TopicTitle: New kerbal videos, would really appreciate some support for them :)

Articles.Content: HEY! so heres the deal, iv started making kerbal space program videos recently and iv been playing since about august last year, my channel right now is only a small one and has taken a few mis-adventure projects which i have stopped, and i plan to make it completely dedicated to kerbal space program and possibly if all goes well a few other games, i care a lot about my viewers opinions and would greatly appreciate some suggestions along with constructive criticism if you want please check them out i shall post both videos here, again suggestions would be fantastic, constructive criticism great, and maybe a like or a subscription? only if you feel generous though, zezey out
